quote: Fun things are fun

quote: To the me back then, you don't nneed to worry. You'll soon find something you can do, something you can set your heart on
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: When it comes time for next year’s school festival, I know we’re going to play even better!

quote: I have one last request. Please slap me in the face with that wad of cash
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: I want to be able to snap my fingers!

quote: Make sure you don’t mistake soy sauce for sugar
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: In the manga, when I wasn’t in the picture, even if I didn’t sing nobody noticed, but if I don’t sing in the anime…
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: I know you’re really a pure hearted person, Nadoka-chan, please snap out of it!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: Let’s eat first then plan our schedule for next year!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: Oh if you’re looking for Mio, she’s still huddled in terror over there
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: I’m scared of hot and cold. In winter, I hide under the heating table and in summer, I lie in bed and do nothing
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: When we started the light music club we said that our slogan was going to be “Budokan or bust!” We worked after school jobs together so I could buy Geeta. We had tea in the club room together and talked about everything. We had training camps at Mugi-chan’s summer homes and looked for a new student who would join the club. I can’t really say we devoted our selves wholeheartedly to practicing, but right now, for us standing here on this stage this auditorium is our Budokan, and we’ll sing our hearts out to the very end!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: Fuwa fuwa time
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: If you have the courage to begin, you have the courage to succeed
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: I'm tree G! Pose of a tree!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: High schoolers are kind of amazing!
